mapper.select: select id,name,offLine,acoffLine,dLine,acdLine,lingYu,aclingYu,careLine,accareLine,roadTest,acroadTest,CONVERT(decimal(18,1),DR*100) as DR,shift,date from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Quality) order by name,id DESC

select name,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*100) as offLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*100) as dLine, convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*100) as lingYu,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*100) as careLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as roadTest,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as DR,date from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Quality) group by date,name

select convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*100) as offLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*100) as dLine, convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*100) as lingYu,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*100) as careLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as roadTest,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as DR,date from Quality where date=( select MAX(date) as date from Quality) group by date

select id,name,offLine,acoffLine,dLine,acdLine,lingYu,aclingYu,careLine,accareLine,roadTest,acroadTest,CONVERT(decimal(18,1),DR*100) as DR,shift,date from Quality where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2} order by name,id DESC

select name,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*100) as offLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*100) as dLine, convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*100) as lingYu,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*100) as careLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as roadTest,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as DR from Quality where (date>=#{date1} and date<= #{date2}) group by name

select convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*100) as offLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*100) as dLine, convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*100) as lingYu,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*100) as careLine,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as roadTest,convert(decimal(10,1) ,sum(acoffLine)/sum(offLine)*sum(acdLine)/sum(dLine)*sum(aclingYu)/sum(lingYu)*sum(accareLine)/sum(careLine)*sum(acroadTest)/sum(roadTest)*100) as DR from Quality where (date>=#{date1} and date<= #{date2})
mapper.insert: insert into Quality( name, offLine,acoffLine, dLine,acdLine, lingYu,aclingYu, careLine,accareLine, roadTest,acroadTest,shift,date) values (#{name},#{offLine},#{acoffLine},#{dLine},#{acdLine},#{lingYu},#{aclingYu},#{careLine},#{accareLine},#{roadTest},#{acroadTest},#{shift},#{date})
